title: The Chasm
content: One morning, Kael jolts awake as his bed shakes. Peering out his window, he gasps. A massive sinkhole in the earth has appeared in front of their house. A strange colorful mist swirls from the chasm. What should Kael do?

options.text: > Grab a rope and climb down the hole to investigate
> Check and make sure Aunt Maela is safe, and make plans for what to do next.
